Circle Circumference and Area calculation

Source: R/circle.R
circle.Rd

circle_circum() and circle_area() Respectively the calculation of the circumference and the area of a circle with radius r.

Usage

circle_circum(r)

circle_area(r)

Arguments

r

numeric

Value

numeric

Functions

  • circle_circum(): circumference calculation

  • circle_area(): area calculation

Examples

circle_circum(12)
#> [1] 75.39822
circle_area(12.3)
#> [1] 475.2916
